description: Hot stud Derrek Diamond returns to see if he can get his first win after ending up on bottom in both of his previous matches. He's maintained his flexibility and started doing cardio training in order to finally be on the dominating end of the sex round. And equally hot stud, Andrew Blue is new to NK and is relying on his past of drunken brawling to get him through the day. Derrek has a lot to prove but Andrew doesn't want to be on the receiving end of a first-time loss. It's the macho thing. Nobody wants to lose on NK and be treated like a bitch in the Sex Round.
title: Andrew Blue vs Derrek Diamond
